member.name: P:InventoryManagement.Api.Contracts.Request.ProductFilterContract.Name
member.summary: Products will be filtered by their Name. Example- Shirt, Pant, etc.

member.name: P:InventoryManagement.Api.Contracts.Request.ProductFilterContract.Size
member.summary: Products will be filtered by their Size. Example- M, L, XL, etc.

member.name: P:InventoryManagement.Api.Contracts.Request.ProductFilterContract.MinPrice
member.summary: Products will be filtered by their Minimum Price. Example- 200, 1000, etc.

member.name: P:InventoryManagement.Api.Contracts.Request.ProductFilterContract.MaxPrice
member.summary: Products will be filtered by their Maximum Price. Example- 200, 1000, etc.

member.name: M:InventoryManagement.Api.Controllers.InventoryController.FetchProductById(System.String)
member.param: Write the Product Id of the product you want to get.

member.name: M:InventoryManagement.Api.Controllers.InventoryController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Delete a product by its ProductId
member.param: Write the Product Id of the product you want to delete.

member.name: M:InventoryManagement.Api.Controllers.InventoryController.GetOrderById(System.String)
member.summary: Get an order of a particular orderId
member.param: Enter the orderId of the order you want to get.
